properties.entry: SELECT PRODUCT_NUM, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, CATEGORY_CODE, STOCK FROM PRODUCT
SELECT PAY_NUM, PHONE_NUM, PAY_TIME, PAY_TOTAL, PAYMENT_NUM FROM PAY
INSERT INTO PRODUCT P ( P.PRODUCT_NUM , P.PROPDUCT_NAME , P.PRODUCT_PRICE , P.CATEGORY_CODE , P.STOCK ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE PRODUCT P SET P.PRODUCT_PRICE = ? WHERE P.PRODUCT_NUM = ?
UPDATE PRODUCT P SET STOCK = ? WHERE P.PRODUCT_NUM = ?
UPDATE PRODUCT P SET P.PRODUCT_NAME = ? WHERE P.PRODUCT_NUM = ?
DELETE FROM PROUDCT P WHERE P.PRODUCT_NUM = ?
